item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, October 30, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. [Opinion] Trump is the man who would be king
2. Trump rally’s Puerto Rico slur lands with a thud in Pennsylvania
3. UK borrowing costs hit post-election high on eve of Reeves’ first Budget
4. Banks warn UK Treasury of risk of sector turmoil after car finance ruling
5. Ukraine and Russia in talks about halting strikes on energy plants
item.guid: FT Most Read: Wednesday, October 30, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
